Thanks for the feedback!

A lot of the questions/comments are too specific =
or specialized for our general overview of the Sengoku period (so if you ha=
ve any more generalized Sengoku-era questions, fire away), but we will keep=
 them in mind for later podcasts after the Introduction to Japanese History=
 series has been completed.
